com.risk.maputils

Class MapValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.maputils.MapValidator

  • public class MapValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs validation of map correctness, also after loading and saving any new map the map should be validated automatically.
    Author:
    HARSH

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • isContinentConnectedGraph

        public static boolean isContinentConnectedGraph(Continent p_continent,
                                                Map p_map)
        This method is used for validating that whether the continents are connected or not.
        Parameters:
        p_continent - is the continent to be validated.
        p_map - is the current map object.
        Returns:
        will return true if the continent is connected in the map.

      • getAdjacentContinents

        public static java.util.List<Continent> getAdjacentContinents(Continent p_continent,
                                                              Map p_map)
        This method is used to return the adjacent continents as a list for any particular continent.
        Parameters:
        p_continent - refers to the continent whose adjacent continents are to be found.
        p_map - refers to the map object.
        Returns:
        will return the list of adjacent continents of the current continent.
